nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: I want everything in my room to be poor quality or better
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: If it has a quality, it had better not be awful.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: I want everything in my room to be normal quality or better
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: If it has a quality, it had better be at least normal.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: I want everything in my room to be good quality or better
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: If it has a quality, it had better be at least good.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: I want everything in my room to be excellent quality or better
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: If it has a quality, it had better be at least excellent.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: I want everything in my room to be masterwork quality or better
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: If it has a quality, it had better be at least masterwork.
